description:
Rear Garden-Right Hand Side
T1-Malus
Fell to ground level and poison. (Crown as close to wall).
ALL ITEMS INCLUDING REMOVING ARISING DEBRIS, LEAVING SITE CLEAN AND TIDY.

•	Tree is located in the rear garden on the right hand side.
•	The trees proximity to the property boundary wall is causing anxiety and apprehension to the occupier/residents.
•	The long term future for the tree is questionable due to its location and future growth requirements.

Rear Garden- Centre
T2-Magnolia
Reduce all branches by 2 metres. (Fell adjacent dead tree). Leaving a finishing height of 6 metres and width of 5 metres.
ALL ITEMS INCLUDING REMOVING ARISING DEBRIS, LEAVING SITE CLEAN AND TIDY.


•	The tree is located in the rear garden on the righthand side.
•	The works are part of a regular maintenance programme to retain the tree at a suitable size for its location.
•	The proposed works would not reduce the amenity value of the tree and will allow sustainable tree management in the long term.
